name: Shapa
0:
”Alexa, ask Shapa for today's activity.”
”Alexa, ask Shapa how many measurements I took last week.”
”Alexa, ask Shapa how many measurements I took in January.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shapa
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Alexa Shapa skill allows users to quickly retrieve health recommendations and information from their Shapa Health account. Taking measurements consistently is crucial to success in our program. The Alexa Shapa skill lets you ask how many measurements you took in past time periods (last week, last month, last January, etc) so you can motivate yourself to keep trending upwards. The skill also lets you ask for Shapa's recommended activity for the day based on your Shapa Android/iOS app activity. Before using, please create an account at www.shapa.me so that you can link Alexa to your account.
